entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
